page.title: 08Once a pupil then caretaker
page.content:
EDUCATION LOCAL HISTORY From 1954_1978 Mrs Knight was Bentworth school's caretaker.When she was there,the back door was blocked up.There was a brick wall where the field opening is.The school used to look like a castle.Only the boys played in the present playground.The girls played in the carpark which was grassed over,in the middle there were 2 silver birches.Girls of 11,in July did Domestic science.At the old village hall, when they were there they did cooking,starching & scrubbing.Every girl when they left school at 14 had to make a nightdress
by Richard & Jenny.
